hera.api

Interface KeyStoreAsyncOperation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KeyStoreAsyncTemplate

    @ApiAudience.Public
 @ApiStability.Unstable
public interface KeyStoreAsyncOperation

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ResultOrErrorFuture<Account> create(java.lang.String password)
      Create an account with password asynchronously.
      ResultOrErrorFuture<EncryptedPrivateKey> exportKey(Authentication authentication)
      Export an encrypted private key of account asynchronously whose key is stored in a server key store.
      ResultOrErrorFuture<Account> importKey(EncryptedPrivateKey encryptedKey, java.lang.String oldPassword, java.lang.String newPassword)
      Import an encrypted private key asynchronously.
      ResultOrErrorFuture<java.util.List<AccountAddress>> list()
      Get account list on a key store asynchronously.
      ResultOrErrorFuture<java.lang.Boolean> lock(Authentication authentication)
      Lock an account asynchronously whose key is in a server key store.
      ResultOrErrorFuture<java.lang.Boolean> unlock(Authentication authentication)
      Unlock an account asynchronously whose key is in a server key store.

    • Method Detail

      • list

        ResultOrErrorFuture<java.util.List<AccountAddress>> list()
        Get account list on a key store asynchronously.
        Returns:
        future of account list or error

      • create

        ResultOrErrorFuture<Account> create(java.lang.String password)
        Create an account with password asynchronously. The private key is stored in a server key store.
        Parameters:
        password - account password
        Returns:
        future of created account or error

      • lock

        ResultOrErrorFuture<java.lang.Boolean> lock(Authentication authentication)
        Lock an account asynchronously whose key is in a server key store.
        Parameters:
        authentication - account authentication
        Returns:
        future of lock result or error

      • unlock

        ResultOrErrorFuture<java.lang.Boolean> unlock(Authentication authentication)
        Unlock an account asynchronously whose key is in a server key store.
        Parameters:
        authentication - account authentication
        Returns:
        future of unlock result or error

      • importKey

        ResultOrErrorFuture<Account> importKey(EncryptedPrivateKey encryptedKey,
                                       java.lang.String oldPassword,
                                       java.lang.String newPassword)
        Import an encrypted private key asynchronously. An oldPassword is used to decrypt private key passed by and an newPassword is used to store private key encrypted in a server.
        Parameters:
        encryptedKey - an encrypted private key
        oldPassword - old password to decrypt encrypted private key
        newPassword - new password to store in a remote storage
        Returns:
        future of account result or error

      • exportKey

        ResultOrErrorFuture<EncryptedPrivateKey> exportKey(Authentication authentication)
        Export an encrypted private key of account asynchronously whose key is stored in a server key store.
        Parameters:
        authentication - account authentication
        Returns:
        future of an encrypted private key
